properties.name: Path
properties.expression: function limbPath_3b() {        function calcTang(side0, side1, point0, point1, point2, fac, inTan) {            const ang1 = Math.atan2(point2[1] - point1[1], point2[0] - point1[0]);            const ang0 = Math.atan2(point1[1] - point0[1], point1[0] - point0[0]);            const p2relY = point2[1] - point0[1];            const p2relX = point2[0] - point0[0];            const pointDistance = (p2relX * (point1[1] - point0[1]) - p2relY * (point1[0] - point0[0])) / Math.max(Math.sqrt(p2relX * p2relX + p2relY * p2relY), 0.0001);            const perpDist = easeOut(Math.abs(pointDistance), 0, length(point2, point0) / 2, 1, 0);            const centDist = easeIn(Math.abs(side0 - side1), 0, length(point0, point2), 0, 1);            const tangShorten = 1 - perpDist * centDist;            const avang = (ang0 + ang1) / 2;            const leng = inTan === true ? length(point0, point1) * fac * tangShorten : length(point1, point2) * fac * tangShorten;            const pointSide = Number(((point2[0] - point0[0]) * (point1[1] - point0[1]) - (point2[1] - point0[1]) * (point1[0] - point0[0])).toFixed(2));            const flipTang = inTan === true ? (pointSide >= 0 ? 1 : -1) * (Math.sign(Number((ang1 - ang0).toFixed(6))) === 1 ? 1 : -1) : (pointSide <= 0 ? -1 : 1) * (Math.sign(Number((ang0 - ang1).toFixed(6))) === 1 ? 1 : -1);            return [Math.cos(avang) * leng * flipTang, Math.sin(avang) * leng * flipTang];        }        const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');	const cw = endctrl.effect('Limber')('Clockwise').value * 0.01;const scaleFactor = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('scaleFactor').value[0];const widthScale = endctrl.effect('Limber')('Width Scale') * 0.01const lengthScale = endctrl.effect('Limber')('Length Scale').value * 0.01;const p3 = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p3ikfkfreek').value;const rotend = thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Auto-rotate').value * 0.01;const footrot = thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Angle').value;const toetan = thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Toe Tangent Angle').value;const heelTan = thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Heel Tangent Angle').value;const footA = degreesToRadians((rotend * endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('ikfkfreekangles').value[2]) + linear(rotend, 0, 1, (cw > 0 ? 90:270), (cw > 0 ? -90:90)) + (cw > 0 ? footrot : -footrot));const footL = thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Length').value * scaleFactor * lengthScale;const tanL = footL * 0.4 // Multiply foot length by a factor to specify tangent lengthconst heelA = cw > 0 ? footA - degreesToRadians(toetan) : footA + degreesToRadians(toetan);const toeA = cw > 0 ? footA - degreesToRadians(180 + heelTan) : footA + degreesToRadians(180 + heelTan);		        const curveLinArr = mul(endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('curvature').value, 0.01);        if (curveLinArr[1] === 0 && curveLinArr[2] === 0) {            return createPath([                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p0').value,                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p1ikfkfreek').value,                endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p2ikfkfreek').value,				p3,				add(p3, [Math.sin(footA) * footL, -Math.cos(footA) * footL]),            ], [], [], false);        }        else {            const p0 = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p0').value;            const p1ikfkfreek = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p1ikfkfreek').value;            const p2ikfkfreek = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('p2ikfkfreek').value;            const ikfkfreeksides = endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value;            const inTangs = [                [0, 0],                curveLinArr[1] === 0 ? [0, 0] : calcTang(ikfkfreeksides[0], ikfkfreeksides[1], p0, p1ikfkfreek, p2ikfkfreek, curveLinArr[1], true),                curveLinArr[2] === 0 ? [0, 0] : calcTang(ikfkfreeksides[1], ikfkfreeksides[2], p1ikfkfreek, p2ikfkfreek, p3, curveLinArr[2], true),                [0, 0],				[-Math.sin(heelA) * tanL, Math.cos(heelA) * tanL],            ];            const outTangs = [                [0, 0],                curveLinArr[1] === 0 ? [0, 0] : calcTang(ikfkfreeksides[1], ikfkfreeksides[0], p0, p1ikfkfreek, p2ikfkfreek, curveLinArr[1], false),                curveLinArr[2] === 0 ? [0, 0] : calcTang(ikfkfreeksides[2], ikfkfreeksides[1], p1ikfkfreek, p2ikfkfreek, p3, curveLinArr[2], false),				[-Math.sin(toeA) * tanL, Math.cos(toeA) * tanL],                [0, 0]            ];            return createPath([			p0,			p1ikfkfreek,			p2ikfkfreek,			p3,			add(p3, [Math.sin(footA) * footL, -Math.cos(footA) * footL]),			], inTangs, outTangs, false);        }    }limbPath_3b();// Limber Library limbPath_3b

properties.name: Stroke Width
properties.expression: const endctrl  = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Stroke Width') * endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('scaleFactor').value[0] * endctrl('ADBE Effect Parade')('Limber')('Width Scale') * 0.01;

properties.name: Stroke Width
properties.expression: thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Stroke').strokeWidth + thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Outline Width') * 2 * (thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Constant Width').value !== 1 ? thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0] : 1)

properties.name: Start Width
properties.expression: thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Stroke').taper.startWidth + (thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Outline Width') * 2 * (thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Constant Width').value !== 1 ? thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0] : 1) / thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Stroke 2').strokeWidth * thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Taper Start'))

properties.name: End Width
properties.expression: thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Stroke').taper.endWidth + (thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Outline Width') * 2 * (thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Constant Width').value !== 1 ? thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0] : 1) / thisLayer.content('Limb').content('Stroke 2').strokeWidth * thisLayer.effect('Path with Foot 3-bone')('Taper End'))

properties.name: Scale
Position
properties.expression: let val = [0, 0];if (thisLayer.hasParent) {	val = thisLayer.parent.fromWorld([0, 0, 0])	};[val[0], val[1], 0];

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: let val = [100, 100]if (thisLayer.hasParent) {    const ctrlScaleFactor = Math.max(length(thisLayer.toComp([0,0]), thisLayer.toComp([0.7071,0.7071])), 0.0001);    val = [value[0] / ctrlScaleFactor, value[1] / ctrlScaleFactor]}val

properties.name: Rotation
properties.expression: let val = 0;if (thisLayer.hasParent) {    const vec = thisLayer.parent.toWorldVec([1, 0, 0]);    val = -radiansToDegrees(Math.atan2(vec[1], vec[0]))}val
